name: Rescue The Bichano Demo
description:
Susana's cat Bichano has disappeared! Help her to find it. 

Your challange begins in a dense forest, full of secrets, dangerous creatures and tough obstacles. 

Features: 

  • Single player adventure. 
  • Precision platformer. 
  • +25 fully explorable rooms. 
  • 4 enemies type. 
  • Controller and Keyboard compatibility. 

Note: 

This game is a demo version and it was created for a learning objective! 

Your feedback is more than welcome 💜

In the future, I definitely will continue working in this project! This game means a lot for me and I really loved creating it. 

Thank you so much for playing! :)

GameJam Version
